Texts.Chs: 在沙漠深处，我们必须对我们的食物有创造性。在我新的^orange;爬虫登布面包^reset;食谱研发好之前，我需要一些样本...^green;你能不能去捕捉一只^orange;沙虫^reset;，然后把数据回传给我？这会帮助我完成食谱！
Texts.Eng: In the deep deserts, we have to be creative with our food. I need a few more samples before my new ^orange;Crawler Dunebun ^reset;recipe is ready... ^green;Could you go and capture a ^orange;Sandcrawler^reset;, then return the data to me? That'll help me finish the recipe!

Texts.Chs: 回到位于^orange;远星庇护所^reset;的^orange;阿拉瓦斯^reset;处
其实，我的朋友。你给了我所需要的。这里有一些酬劳你麻烦的功勋代币，还有一份食谱，这样你就可以自己做^orange;爬虫登布面包^reset;了！
Texts.Eng: Vas Vha'leih, my friend. You gave me exactly what I needed. Here's some Tokens of Merit for your trouble, and a copy of the recipe so you can make your own ^orange;Crawler Dunebuns^reset;!
